TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: Tang & F. T. Wang ex L. K. Dai

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 大果亲族薹草 da guo qin zu tai cao

treatment.description: Leaf blades ca. 1.5 mm wide. Female glumes oblong-lanceolate, ca. 1.5 mm. Utricles 3–4 mm, beak ca. 1/3 length of utricle. Fl. and fr. Aug–Sep.
treatment.distribution: ● Mountain slopes, ditch sides, rock crevices, grasslands; 1300–1800 m. Chongqing (Chengkou).
